CustomField.description: This will show you how many days from Contract Received to Today excluding weekends
CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Contract_Received__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Contract_Received__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Number of Days in Contractual
